channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As the DOJ’s antitrust trial begins, Google will seek to avoid ad tech breakup

item.title: Howard Stern says he’s canceling Disney Plus ‘to say with the pocketbook that I do not support’ ABC yanking Jimmy Kimmel off the air
item.description: Stern had his own fair share of battles with the FCC over the years.

item.title: The unicorn killer: Why regulatory risk keeps destroying startup value and what to do about it
item.description: The regulatory whiplash between federal approval and state or local prohibition has created perhaps the cruelest trap for emerging industries.

item.title: How to Rebuild Employee Trust After a Layoff — Without Saying ‘We’re a Family’
item.description: The dos, don’ts, and complicated dynamics of leading after people are let go.

item.title: Rimowa is making leather handbags now

item.title: Strive to buy Semler Scientific in merger of Bitcoin treasuries

item.title: Trump Reveals Murdochs and Dell Could Potentially Take Part in TikTok Deal
item.description: The news about the Murdochs and Dell is just the latest twist in a long-running saga about what the future holds for TikTok.

item.title: How This Influencer Turned Viral Merch Into a Fast-Growing Business
item.description: Dairy Boy founder Paige Lorenze has wielded her influence to build a scrappy business with 160 percent year-over-year growth.

item.title: Oracle announces leadership shakeup, with two insiders as new co-CEOs

item.title: September’s box office hot streak dies down the stretch as ticket sales plunge 50%
item.description: Ron Howard’s 1995 hit “Apollo 13” played in 200 theaters this weekend for its 30th anniversary as well. It made an estimated $600,000.

item.title: 4 Tips for Better Sleep From the Hims & Hers Founder
item.description: Joe Spector, who started two successful companies, says changing his sleep routine led to better business outcomes.

item.title: Over 70% of H-1B visa holders are Indian citizens. Its government says Trump jacking the fee to $100,000 is ‘likely to have humanitarian consequences’
item.description: The founder of Greycroft Partners says "there is not a single company that I have invested in the last 10 years that could afford to pay this."
